itemDescription: English writer (under the pen name "B.B."), illustrator, and country sportsman (1905-1990)

wikipedia_page.main: Denys James Watkins-Pitchford MBE (25 July 1905 – 8 September 1990) was a British naturalist, an illustrator and a children's author under the pseudonym "BB". He won the 1942 Carnegie Medal for British children's books.
